name: Thelost
description:
You are lost in a forest after waking up.

In the middle of nowhere, she decides to explore the interior of the forest to find a way out.

A secret awaits you... but the darkness of the forest, think of a clear answer.

Will you comply? Or will you refuse to seek the truth?

The choice is yours.

"The lost" is a very short mystery-themed visual novel about an encounter in the middle of a forest, you are lost. Through the conversation and your actions you will learn more about them, how you got there, what the truth is.

It is up to you what decisions to make. It's up to you to believe if it's right.

Characteristic:

A mysterious story about what that forest really means.

Different options depending on the day.

An experience between 15-25 minutes to get the finals.

5 finals.

Credits:

Made in Unity

Original story created by me, Santiago "Mihoz"

Monster, character and stage art design. AI StableDiffusion was used

Language: Spanish
